item.title: 6 Literatur/References
item.description: 6 Literatur/References Die Verfassung dieses Buches werden durch die folgenden Quellen unterst√ºtzt: https://www.atlassian.com/continuous-delivery/principles/continuous-integration-vs-delivery-vs-deployment https://www.splunk.com/de-de/data-insider/what-is-ci-cd-pipeline.html https://semaphoreci.com/cicd https://www.redhat.com/en/topics/devops/what-cicd-pipeline https://www.journaldunet.fr/web-tech/guide-de-l-entreprise-digitale/1443814-gitlab-tout-savoir-sur-la-plateforme-de-devops-open-source/ https://www.redhat.com/fr/topics/devops/what-is-ci-cd https://www.journaldunet.fr/web-tech/guide-de-l-entreprise-digitale/1443820-jenkins-logiciel-star-de-l-integration-continue-open-source-gratuit/ https://www.thedigizones.com/blog/what-is-continuous-integration-ci-continuous-deployment-cd/
